content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to live data and cannot make recommendations. However, there are several rental car companies in Massa and the surrounding area that offer competitive rates on car rentals. I suggest looking up online reviews and comparing prices from multiple rental car companies to find the best deal. Some of the major car rental companies like Hertz, Avis, Sixt, Europcar, and Budget offer affordable rates, and there may also be local car rental companies in the area that provide good deals. It is recommended to book in advance to ensure availability and to check if there are any special discounts or promotions available.
